page.title: 14HOUSING
page.content:
....continued Many of these houses are now owner occupied.The other post war building is mostly of a higher income group, many of the houses being detached. There is little building going on now, some large properties have been demolished(e.g. one at present in Marsh Lane)and have been replaced by new properties.
HOUSING IN GRID SQUARES 1,2,3 The area surveyed comprised part of the Green Belt and contained little housing.One sector comprised of Mill Hill Golf Course and was crossed by the M1 and the A1.Another sector included Moat Mount Open Space and Mote End Farm - a stud farm but also incorporating dairy cattle.Grid Square 2 contained farm land and sports grounds.
